title: Astonishing Thor (Hardcover)
description: "Waves are but water, wind but air. And though lightning be fire...it must answer thunder's call!" The God of Thunder finds himself battling a mysterious surge of natural catastrophes — hurricanes, tidal waves, earthquakes. At first, the Son of Odin suspects Zephyr, immortal mistress of the winds — but soon, he finds that the climactic upheaval must be attributed to a much larger force: Ego, the Living Planet! Spinning out of the destruction of Asgard, ASTONISHING THOR is an out-of-this-world adventure — and the entire universe hangs in the balance! Collecting ASTONISHING THOR #1-5.
